text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-FontStyle
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-TableRuleStyle
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ListStyle

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-styleType
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _TableRuleStyleTable Rule StyleDefines table cell rendering characteristics
  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-styleType
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ListStyleList StyleDefines list rendering characteristics
  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-styleType
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _FontStyleFont StyleDefines font rendering characteristics

name: StyleType
title: StyleType
description: (abstract) Used within an instance to give the author some control over various aspects of rendering
